206817.「ここが 砂の都ファラザード。\n 他の国とは ずいぶん 雰囲気が違うだろう。:
This is Sand City Farazard. It has a very
different atmosphere from the other nations.

206818.「我が主の 統治のもとに\n さまざまな欲望が 日夜問わず交差する……\n まさ:
Under the rule of my lord, all kinds of
desires intersect day and night...it is truly
the nightless city of the Demon World.

206819.「ようやく 帰ってきたことだし \n ゼクレスと バルディスタでの首尾を\n 報:
Now that I'm finally back, I have to report on
how things went in Zechres and Valdista...

206820.「なじみの店にも カオを出しておきたい。\n 先に このファラザードが誇る\n:
I'd like to pop in on some old stores. Before
we go, let me show you the bazaar, the symbol
of freedom that Farazard prides itself on.

206821.「活気があって 一見の価値があるぞ。: It's lively and worth a look.

206822.「魔界にある ３つの大国のうち\n ファラザードは いちばんの新興国だ。:
Of the three major powers in the Demon World,
Farazard is the most fledgling.

206829.「……もし お前が魔王だったら\n そいつらをどうする？\n<select_nc:
...if you were the Demon King, how would
you handle it?
<select_nc>
Knock 'em dead!
Ignore them.
Let me think.
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case 3>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

206830.「徹底的につぶす……か。 \n たしかに 苦労してかき集めた財産を\n 横取りす:
Crush them thoroughly...huh? Indeed, those who
take away our hard-earned wealth may need to
be punished.

206834.「俺は 王城と連絡を取ってみる。 \n お前は バザールの問題を 解決してみせろ:
I'll try to get in touch with the castle. You
try to solve the problem in the bazaar.

206886.「わかった わかった……後でな！\n こっちは 帰ってきたばかりなんだし\n ち:
All right, all right... later! I just got
back, so give me a break.

206890.「それと お前には この城内に\n 部屋を与えてやろう。\n 魔王のしもべに ふ:
And for you, I will give you a room in this
castle. A room of the finest quality, fit for
a servant of the Demon King.

207054.「慣れぬ魔界で ユシュカに振り回され \n 長旅の疲れも 出てくる頃だろう……。:
I'm sure you're tired from your long journey, being dragged around by Yushka through the unfamiliar Demon World, so please feel free to
use this room.

207057.「君は ユシュカの血を 与えられたことで\n 魔族に変じ 生き延びたわけだが\n:
You were given Yushka's blood, which turned you into a demon and allowed you to survive, but it's a forbidden spell that is a secret
even in the Demon World.

207059.「ユシュカのことだから いつもの調子で\n 君のことを しもべにしてやったとでも:
Yushka, in his usual fashion, may have told
you that he made you his servant, but...

207062.「ユシュカは ただの魔族ではない。魔王だ。\n そんな重大事を 伝令から聞かされ:
Yushka is not just a demon. He is a Demon
King. I was quite worried when the messenger
told me of such an important matter...

207063.「あいつにも 何か 考えがあってのこと。 \n その決断が 必ず 実を結ぶと信じ:
He had something in mind. I've been entrusted
with the castle until now, believing that his
decision will surely bear fruit.

207064.「そして……今日 この城に到達した\n ユシュカと君を見て それが正しかったと\:
And... seeing you and Yushka reach this castle
today, I am finally convinced that I was
right.

207066.「他国の魔王との 危険な交渉をとげて\n 我が主を ファラザードまで\n 無事に:
You have negotiated dangerous deals with Demon
Kings from other lands and returned my lord
safely to Farazard.

207071.「まったく。ウワサをすれば これか……。\n 迷惑をかけることを 少しも 悪びれ:
Speak of the devil... I take back my apology
for inconveniencing him.

207072.「お互いに 苦労は多いが \n 共に あいつを支えていこう。:
We both have a lot of hard work ahead of us,
but together we can support him.

207073.「ユシュカなら ザードの尖塔だろう。\n 昔から 高いところに 登りたがるのだ。:
Yushka is probably at the Zard Spire. He's
always liked climbing up high places.

207095.「ナジーン！ どうして お前は\n そんなに アタマが カタいんだ！？: Nazine! Why are you so hard-headed?

207097.「いくら 幼なじみとはいえ \n 魔王様に向かって なんだ そのクチのきき方！:
Even though we've known each other since
childhood... How dare you talk to the Demon
King like that!

207100.「暗くて いちいちカオなど わかるものか。\n あーあ カタブツな副官のおかげで:
It was too dark to recognize every single
face. Ahh, my little snub-nosed lieutenant has
ruined my momentary respite.

207103.「はっ。副官殿は 有事の際に \n ファラザードを守る 自信がないとみえる。\n:
Ha. My second-in-command didn't even have the
confidence to protect Farazard during an
emergency. If it wasn't for us...

207104.「お……おお。なんだ。\n いるならいるって 言えよ。:
Oh...oh. What? If you're here, at
least say something.

207105.「お前 起きるのが 遅すぎだぞ。 \n 待ちくたびれた上に いらん説教をくらった:
Took you long enough to get up. Not only was I
tired of waiting, I've had to put up with
never-ending lectures.

207108.「ああ……この衣装は 魔王の正装だ。 \n いよいよ 魔仙卿に会うというのに\n:
Ah...this is the Demon King's formal attire.
We're about to meet the Oracle, and we don't
want to go looking like a commoner, do we?

207109.「よし！ これで 全員そろったな。\n ナジーン。これからのことを\n こいつに:
All right! We're all here. Nazine. Explain to
them what's going to happen next.

207114.「待たせたな ふたりとも。: I've kept you waiting, you two.

207119.「大審門よ！ 役者はそろったぞ！\n 魔仙卿への道を 開くがいい！:
Demongate! The players have assembled! Open
the way to the Oracle!

207143.「お前の踊るさまを 見物しててやる。\n 後で 合流しようぜ。: I'll watch you dance. We'll meet up later.

207154.「よう。ばっちり見てたぞ。\n なかなかの 戦いぶりだったじゃないか。:
Hey. I was watching you closely. You put up
quite a fight, didn't you?

207156.「チッ……。あらかた 潰したつもりだったが \n お前の存在を すっかり忘れてた:
Damn... I thought I had gotten most of them,
but I completely forgot about you.

207158.「まったく……今のは さすがに疲れたぞ。\n 早く 魔仙卿に会って\n 文句のひ:
Man... I'm getting tired of this. I can't wait
to meet the Oracle so I can file a complaint.

207179.「いったい この山は どこまで続くんだ？\n だいぶ 登ってきたと思うんだがな…:
How far does this mountain go? We've already
come a long way...

207181.「その 物騒なものをしまえよ ヴァレリア。\n いったい 何の騒ぎだ？:
Put that thing away, Valeria. What's going on
here?

207194.「どう考えても あやしいよ……\n 君も そう思うだろう？<yesno><clo:
It's a bit suspicious... don't you think?
<yesno><close>

207195.「おーい！ つべこべ言わず こっちこいよ。\n ふたりの分も 食っちまうぞ。:
Hey! Don't be shy, come on over. Or I'll eat
both your portions.

207196.「……こうやって 三国の魔王が\n 一堂に会するのは はじめてだな。:
...This is the first time the Demon Kings of
the three kingdoms have gathered in one place.

207197.「小うるさい部下や 母親の監視もないんだ。\n 気がねなく お互いのことを 話そ:
No nagging subordinates or motherly
supervision. We can talk to each other without
restraint.

207238.「ふん……貴様などで 相手になるのか？: Hmph... You think you're a match for me?

207241.「ちっ……スッテンテンの 早とちりめ。\n こいつは 大魔王候補者じゃないぜ。:
Tch...Suttenten's jumping to conclusions.
You're not even a Great Demon King candidate.

221122.「ひとつ １００万ゴールドぉ！？\n そんなの 買えるわけないっしょ！: One for a million gold!? I can't afford that!

221124.「やくそうが ８０万ゴールド！？\n なによ！ よそ者には 売れないってこと？:
A Medicinal Herb for 800,000 Gold!? What the
hell!? Are you saying you won't sell to
outsiders?

221126.「イエ イエ イエ～！\n ワタクシども ファラザード商業組合は\n どんなお客:
No, no, no! The Farazard Commercial
Association welcomes all customers! Yes!

221128.「ただ そのぉ…… \n 今は深刻な 品不足でして ハイ……。\n これでも 適:
But, you see... there is a serious shortage
right now, and this is still the best price.
Yes.

221130.「んもー 信じらんない！\n ファラザードのバザールは やくそうも買えない\n:
I can't believe this! I'll tell everyone that
the bazaar in Farazard is a rip-off where you
can't even buy simple herbs!

221138.「まずは 無事で何よりだわ。 \n おいしい おみやげ話のひとつでも\n 聞かせ:
First of all, I'm glad you're safe. I'd love
to hear one of your lovely stories, but...

221140.「まあ かわいらしい しもべさん。\n いくらで 買ったの？\n 私に 売ってく:
Well, what a cute little servant. How much did
you pay for them? Would you sell them to me?

221142.「ざれ言は後にしろ ジルガモット。 \n 元締めの お前がいながら\n このあり:
Save the small talk for later, Jirgamot.
You're supposed to be in charge here, so what
the hell is going on?

221144.「このバザールは ジャリムバハ砂漠の北東\n ディンガ交易所から運ばれる\n さ:
This bazaar trades in a variety of goods
coming from the Northeast Dinga Trade Post in
the Jyarimbaha Desert.

221146.「近ごろ その大事な交易路 ズムウル峠に \n 次から次へと 凶悪な魔物が現れて:
Recently, one after another, vicious monsters have appeared in Zumul Pass, an important trade route, and attacking the traders who are
carrying goods.

221148.「ファラザード軍に 討伐を頼んだものの\n あちらにも ご事情があるようで\n:
I asked Farazard's army to take down the enemy, but they said they had their own reasons and that they could not make any major
moves...

221150.「そーなんでゴザイマス！\n 品物が届かなくて 売るものナッシン！:
That's right! I have nothing to sell because I
haven't received any goods!

221152.「そして 物価は 急上昇……\n わたくし 首が回りません…………。:
And prices have skyrocketed... my head is
spinning...

221154.「……みんな あなたを 待っていたの。: We've all been waiting for you.

221156.「後のことは まかせておけ。 \n 俺たちが 元通りのバザールに戻してやる。:
We'll take care of the rest. We'll restore the
bazaar to its original state.

221158.「ユシュカ様ァ～！ 恩にきるデスヨ～！: Lord Yushka～! We're in your debt!

221160.「ひとまず 旅の疲れは 取らないとな。\n 宿に泊まって 作戦会議だ。:
First of all, we should rest up from our trip.
We'll stay at the inn for a strategy meeting.

221166.「この世には ワケありな奴らが ごまんといる。 \n 集落からあぶれた者 借金を:
There are a million and one people in this world. Those who have been left behind, those who have fallen into debt, those who have lost
their homes, those who have nowhere to go...

221168.「あらゆる者を分けへだてなく 受け入れる代わり\n それまでの 一切の縁を 断ち:
In exchange for accepting all people without distinction, one must sever all ties with their past and form a contract with the Demon
King of Farazard.

221170.「ゼクレスのような 血統主義でも \n バルディスタみたいな 恐怖統治でもない方:
This nation does not operate based on pedigree
like Zechres, nor is it a reign of terror like
Valdista.

221172.「ファラザードの魔王の務めは\n 契約を 果たすこと。\n 民を庇護し その暮ら:
The duty of the Demon King of Farazard is to
fulfill his contracts. To protect his people
and guarantee their livelihood...

221174.「だが 魔王との契約を結ばず \n 一方的に ファラザードの富を奪おうとする\n:
However, there are also some rogues in the
area who refuse to make a pact with the Demon
King and try to steal Farazard's wealth.

221176.「今回の バザールの問題も\n ファラザードの魔王のやり方が\n 気に食わない連:
The bazaar problem must be the work of those
who don't like the way the Demon King of
Farazard does things.

221178.「ならず者など 取るに足らない……か。\n いい視点だ。俺も 問題の根っこは\n:
The "rogue" is insignificant...huh? That's a
good point of view. I, too, have a feeling
that the root of the problem lies elsewhere.

221180.「ああ よく考えろ。 \n 思考を止めず 最善の策を求める者だけが\n 魔界を:
Ah, good thinking. Only those who never stop
thinking and seek the best plan can truly
survive in the Demon World.

221182.「……よし いいだろう。 \n お前の思う通り 好きにするがいい。: ...Very well. You do what you think is best.

221184.「この件に関しては さっき会った \n 元締めのジルガモットが くわしいだろう。:
Jirgamot, the woman we just met with, would
know a lot more about this.

221186.「俺のしもべとして ふさわしい働きを\n 期待してるぞ。今は 身体を休めておけ。:
As my servant, I have high expectations of
you. For now, rest your body. Tomorrow, we
will split up.

221192.「これでこそ ファラザードのバザールだわ。 \n しもべさんのおかげで ひと安心:
Now this is what Farazard's bazaar should be
like. One less problem, thanks to you.

221194.「ネエ ネエ ネエ～！\n アンタ 大活躍だったんだってェ！？\n ヤルジャン:
Hey, hey, hey! Did you play a big part in
this!? Not bad for a servant!

221196.「なるほど。有能なるかな しもべ殿………… \n ユシュカ様の目に 狂いなし。:
I see. You are quite capable, servant... Lord
Yushka has a good eye.

221198.「ふふ……しもべ呼ばわりは お気に召さない？ \n これまでも ユシュカに さん:
You don't like being called a servant? You've
been hanging around Yushka a lot, so it's only
natural.

221200.「でもね ユシュカは 本当に\n 価値のあるものにしか 興味を示さないの。\n:
But you see, Yushka is only interested in
things that are truly valuable. Especially if
it's something he wants to keep by his side.

221202.「あなた よっぽど\n ユシュカに 気に入られているのよ。: You must really be in Yushka's good graces.

221204.「おぉ～い 次の隊商が 到着するぞぉ。 \n 今まで 遅れてた分が 一気に来るそ:
The next caravan is arriving. The ones that
have been delayed until now are coming in all
at once.

221206.「ヤッベ！ はたらかにゃソンソン！\n また会おうゼ しもべ！:
Uh oh! I've got to get back to work! See you
later, servant!

221208.「御用の際は ごひいきに しもべ殿…………。:
Please visit us when you're in need,
servant...

221210.「ふふ。しもべ殿……ね。とはいえ \n 大活躍したのに あんまりな扱いよね？\n:
Fufu. Servant...right. A bit improper despite
such good work, isn't it? I'll tell them to
address you by name from now on.

221212.「いい取り引きを ありがとう。\n 今度は お客様としても 会いにきて。\n あ:
Thank you for your hard work. Come and see me
as a customer next time. You're always
welcome.

221214.<center>いまいましき ユシュカのしもべへ\nよくも コケにしてくれたな。:
Wretched servant of Yushka, how dare you get
in our way! You have wounded our pride.

221216.<center>裏通りのアジトで お前を待つ。\n逃げられると 思うなよ！:
We'll be waiting for you in our backstreet
hideout. Don't even think about running away!

221220.「ククク……。\n 我らのアジトへ ヨゥヨゥ おいでなすったァ。: Kukuku... You finally made it to our hideout.

221222.「アンタのこたァ ずっと監視してたんだヨゥ。\n ユシュカと バザールに現れた時:
We've been watching you. Ever since you and
Yushka showed up at the bazaar.

221224.「流れ者どもを そそのかして 隊商を追いはぎィ\n ファラザードの息の根止める:
You got in the way of the boss's plan to
hassle the outsiders, drive off the traders,
and cripple Farazard.

221226.「おやびん おやびーん！\n 例のヤツが ノコノコきたよーお！: Boss, Boss! You-know-who just came in!

221228.「ガーッハッハッハッハ！！\n 泣く子も黙る シシカバブ団の首領ぉ……:
Gaahahaha! Even crying babies shut up before
the leader of the Shish Kebab clan...

221230.「この シシカバブさまに たでついたこどぉ\n たあっぷり 後悔させでやるろぉお:
You'll rue the day you ever crossed paths with
me, Shish Kebab!

221232.「もともどぉ ここは ザード遺跡ってぇ \n オデたち 盗賊団のすみかだぁ。\n:
Originally, this place was called Zard Ruins,
the home of me and my band of thieves, until
the current Demon King came and took over.

221234.「あんの魔王は バカ野郎だぁ！\n オデたちのこと なんにも わがっちゃいねえ。:
That Demon King is an idiot! He doesn't care
about me or the others at all.

221236.「自由の国だ なんだと ほざきやがるがぁ \n けっぎょくは アタマの切れるヤツ:
They talk about a free country, but all that
matters is that smart people do business, make
money and get rich...

221238.「だっだら オデたちも 自由にするど。\n こんな ふざけた国はぁ\n 全部 奪:
So we're gonna be free, too. We're gonna take
this joke of a country, and tear it all
down...

221240.「この オデが 王サマに \n なってやるんらよぉおおおおぉおお！！: Then I'm gonna be the king!!

221242.「なるほど そういうことか。: I see. So that's how it is.

221244.「こいつを 泳がせておいて よかったぜ。\n 大した元手もかからず\n アジトも:
I'm glad I let them move freely. Now I've
caught the hideout and the gang in one fell
swoop.

221246.「ばかばかーッ！\n ユシュカには 気づかれないように\n おびき寄せろって 言:
Dummy! I told you to lure them in without
Yushka finding out!

221250.「暴力に訴えるのは 好きじゃないんだがな……。: I'm not a fan of resorting to violence...

221254.「コイツラ マジ ヤッベー！\n イカレタ ツヨサ ハンパネー！: These guys are bad news! They're crazy strong!

221258.「あらかたの賊は つぶしたつもりだったが\n お前らみたいな ヤンチャ坊主どもが:
I thought I had taken down most of the
bandits, but there are still a few of you
naughty boys left.

221260.「俺のいない間に やりたい放題 \n やっちまおうって 目論みだろうが……\n:
You thought you could do whatever you wanted
while I was gone...but that was naive.

221262.「たしかに ここは 自由の都。\n だが 自由にしていいことと 悪いことがある。:
It's true that this is a free city. But there are things you can do with your freedom and things you can't. Resorting to violence is
part of the latter.

221264.「この 世の中の常識…… \n 他の連中にも 教えてやってくれるな？:
Will you teach the others about this common
sense?

221268.「やれやれ。手間かけさせやがって……: Good grief. You really made me work...

221272.「ほう……こいつは 意外と……。: Well... this guy is surprisingly tough...

221276.「シシカバブといったな デカいの。: So, big guy, you're Shish Kebab, right?

221278.「お前の その体力と 頑丈さがあれば \n ファラザードの特攻隊長くらいには な:
With your strength and sturdiness, you could
be Farazard's suicide squad captain!

221280.「ばっ ばっ ばっ……！\n バカにしでんのがあああああああっっ！！: Y, y, you...! You're making fun of me!

221282.「こちらです ナジーン殿！\n ジルガモットからの 通報では\n ここに 盗賊団:
This way, Mr. Nazine! Jirgamot reported that
this is where the thieves are hiding.

221286.「覚えてろ ユシュカぁ！\n いつか オデが ボコボコにしてやるんど！！:
Remember, Yushka! One day, I'm gonna beat you
into a pulp!

221288.「賊どもは まだ 近くにいる。\n 速やかに追討せよ。:
The bandits are still nearby. Pursue them
quickly.

221292.「……お前たちは 盗賊団の者ではないな？: ...You're not with the thieves, are you?

221294.「こんな 品格にあふれた 盗賊がいるか？: What kind of thief would have such dignity?

221296.「本件に関わった者たちは\n この後 ファラザード城へ出頭し\n 一部始終を 説:
All those involved in this matter are to
report to Farazard Castle after this meeting
and explain the whole story.

221298.「俺たちは ならず者を 成敗したんだぞ。\n 少しは ほめてくれたって いいんだ:
We defeated those ruffians. We deserve a
little praise for that.

221300.「ファラザード城の正門は 中央広場にある。\n 門兵のホルティンに 声をかければ:
The main entrance to Farazard Castle is in
Center Plaza. Just speak to Holten, the gate
guard, and he will let you in.

221302.「あの メタルスライムより おカタいのが\n ファラザードの魔王の副官 ナジーン:
That guy who was stiffer than a Metal Slime
was Nazine, right-hand man of the Demon King
of Farazard.

221304.「さて。ご招待あずかったことだし\n いよいよ ファラザード城へ……\n 魔王様:
Well, now. Now that we've been invited, it's
time to go to Farazard Castle... and meet the
Demon King.

221310.「ゼクレスの魔王と バルディスタの魔王を\n 大審門の前に 引きずり出さんがため:
As an emissary of Farazard, I arranged for
both the Demon Kings of Zechres and Valdista
to gather before the Demongate...

221312.「その正体は 魔界の南を統べる 新興国の魔王。\n ……まあ そういうことだ。:
But my true identity is the Demon King of the
new nation that rules the southern part of the
Demon World.

221314.「ユシュカは 自分の言葉で\n ふたりの魔王を説得すると 我を押し通した。\n:
Yushka insisted on persuading the two Demon
Kings with his own words. I objected, saying
it was too dangerous...

221316.「だから 素性は 隠し通しただろ。\n その辺の雑魚どもにバレたら 面倒なのは\:
That's why I kept my identity secret. Of
course I knew that it would be trouble if the
mooks around here found out and word spread.

221318.「しかし この期に及んで ご自分のしもべにまで\n 隠し通していたのには 感心し:
But I'm not impressed that you kept it a
secret from your own servant, even at this
late stage.

221320.「ファラザードに戻って 身の安全が確保できたら\n すぐにでも 伝えるつもりだっ:
I was going to tell them as soon as I got back
to Farazard and felt safe.

221322.「だが バザールでは 問題が起きていて\n それどころじゃなくなったんだ。\n:
But there was a problem at the bazaar, and I
had to deal with it. Weren't you supposed to
be responsible in my absence?

221324.「お手をわずらわせ 申し訳ありません。\n ですが こちらにも 事情がありまして:
I apologize for the trouble I have caused you.
But I had my reasons, and we have been eagerly
awaiting the return of our king.

221326.「ご存知の通り 新興国である我が国の兵力は \n 充実しているとは言いがたく 国:
As you know, as an emerging nation, we are not
well armed, and we are struggling to both
defend our borders and patrol the town.

221328.「あなたが外遊中に得た 豊富な経験をいかして \n この状況を打破する 目覚まし:
I hope that you will use the wealth of experience you gained during your trip abroad and share with us your remarkable wisdom to
help us overcome this situation.

221330.「彼女の 労をねぎらうのを\n どうぞ お忘れなく。:
Please don't forget to thank her for her hard
work.

221334.「ほら。これは これまでの礼と……\n シシカバブ団を退治した 手間賃だ。\n:
Here. This is for all the work you've done so
far, and for the trouble with exterminating
the Shish Kebab clan. Go on and take it.

221336.「ナジーン。後は まかせるぞ。: Nazine. I'll leave the rest to you.

221340.「君の部屋は １階の西側に 用意させよう。\n 部屋の前には 侍女のウテンが 立:
Your room will be on the west side of the first floor. Uten, the maid, will be standing in front of the room. If you get lost, you can
use her for reference.

221342.「……君とは 少し 話がしたい。\n 私も 後で向かうから\n 部屋で 待ってい:
I'd like to have a word with you. I'll be
there later, so could you wait for me in that
room?

221354.「ユシュカが アストルティアから連れてきた\n 君の件については 報告を受けてい:
Yushka has informed me of the circumstances
that brought you here from Astoltia.

221356.「ユシュカと 血の契約を 交わしたこともな。\n ……話したかったのは そのこと:
And that you made a blood pact with Yushka.
That's what I wanted to talk to you about.

221358.「高位の魔族が 他者に 生き血を与えることで\n その生命と 運命を 分かちあう:
It is a ritual in which a high-ranking demon
shares their life and destiny by giving their
lifeblood to another.

221360.「禁術とは そんな 都合のよいものではない。:
The forbidden art is not such a convenient
thing.

221362.「命さえ落としかねない 危険な賭けなのだ。\n まして 魔族ならぬ者に 血を与え:
It is a dangerous gamble that could even kill you. And to give blood to someone who is not a demon... to tell the truth, it's a miracle
that it even succeeded.

221364.「あらためて 礼を言わせてほしい。\n 君には 本当に感謝している。:
I want to thank you again. I am truly grateful
to you.

221366.「あいつは 型破りで 危うい所もある……。\n 正直 会談の成功よりも その身の:
He's unconventional and dangerous at times, but... to be honest, his safety is more valuable to me than the success of the
meetings.

221368.「死んだ魔王より 生きている使い魔 \n ……とは言うが アストルティアにも\n:
They say "A living familiar is better than a
dead Demon King." Does Astoltia have a similar
saying?

221372.「帰ってこられたはずの 魔王様が\n また どこかへ 姿を消されまして……。:
The Demon King, who was supposed to have
returned, has disappeared again...

221374.「これから 私は 今後の公務について\n 臨時の会議を 開かねばならない……。\:
I have to hold a special meeting about my
official duties going forward... I would
appreciate it if someone went to fetch him.

221376.「魔界の南部は 砂漠に覆われていて\n 豊かな実りなど とても 期待できない。\:
The southern part of Demon World is covered with desert, and it is not expected to produce abundant harvests. That is why trade has
developed since ancient times.

221378.「砂漠の小国家群が それぞれに隊商を組んで\n 農作物や家畜 毛皮や織物など\n:
Small groups of desert nations traded with
each other in various goods, such as crops,
livestock, furs, and textiles.

221380.「俺も もとは 宝石商の生まれだ。\n 隊商の荷車が ゆりかごみたいなものだった:
I, too, was born into the jewelry business.
The wagons of the merchants were like cradles.

221382.「宝石は 富と権力の象徴だから \n 俺が渡り歩いた国は どこも活気にあふれ\n:
Jewelry is a symbol of wealth and power, so
every country I've been to has been a vibrant,
dreamy, glorious place.

221384.「だが そういう国ほど おどろくくらい\n あっさりと 滅んでしまう。\n そん:
However, I was surprised at how easily such
nations were destroyed. I have seen such a
scene many times...

221386.「侵略 内乱 あるいは 天災…… \n なんにせよ そのきざしが現れた時\n 奴:
Invasion, civil war, natural disasters...
whatever it is, at the first sign of it, they
put it off...

221388.「そして いつしか 積もり積もった \n 災いの火種が 破滅を呼び寄せるのだ。:
And one day, the accumulated sparks of
misfortune bring ruin.

221390.「思考を止めることは 死ぬことと同じだ。\n 考え続け 新しいものを取り入れなけ:
To stop thinking is the same as dying. If you
don't keep thinking and taking in new things,
you won't survive in this Demon World.

221392.「……だから 俺は\n 今までの 魔界にはない方法で\n 俺の理想郷を 築くこと:
So I've decided to build my utopia in a way
that has never been done before in the Demon
World.

221394.「そう……今まで どんな魔王も\n 試したことのない 新たな方法で…………。:
Yes... in a new way that no Demon King has
ever dared try before...

221396.「これが 砂の都ファラザード。\n 俺の 自慢の国だ。:
This is Sand City Farazard. It's my pride and
joy.

221398.「ここまで 国を大きくするのは 苦労したぞ。\n ジャリムバハ砂漠の小国家群を:
It was hard work to make the country this big.
We had to unify the small states of the
Jyarimbaha Desert by any means necessary.

221400.「まだ 解決すべき問題は ごまんとある。\n シシカバブ団みたいな連中は ファラ:
There are still a million problems to solve.
People like the Shish Kebab clan are the dark
side of Farazard...

221402.「だが 俺の野望は ファラザードに留まらない。 \n この魔界は もっと新しく:
But my ambitions go beyond Farazard. I can
make this Demon World newer, more exciting,
more interesting.

221404.「それを 成しとげられるのは……\n 大魔王になった 俺だけだ。:
Only I, as the Great Demon King, can
accomplish this.

221406.「お前のほうは 早く 元の身体に戻りたい \n 一心だろうが 俺が 大魔王になる:
I know you just want to get back to your normal body as soon as possible, but until I become the Great Demon King, you're going to
have to work hard, so be prepared.

221408.「明朝 デモンマウンテンへ 出発だ。\n 俺の 足手まといにならぬよう\n 自分:
Tomorrow morning, we will leave for Demon
Mountain. Make sure you rest well in your room
so that you don't slow me down.

221422.「至極 まっとうな進言をしてますよ 私は。\n 私のアタマが カタいのではなく\:
I am giving you very honest advice. It's not
that my head is too hard, but that yours is
too soft.

221424.「昨夜遅く 裏通りで 賊の掃討にあたっていた\n 兵士たちを呼び集め 勝手に 任:
Late last night, you summoned the soldiers who had been sweeping up bandits in the alleyways, relieved them of their duties, and threw a
banquet, where they drank, sang and had a good time.

221426.「駆けつけてみれば 兵士だけでなく \n 町の住民……挙句の果てに おたずね者ま:
When I rushed over, I found not only the soldiers, but also the townspeople...and to top it off, even fugitives were among the
party crowd.

221428.「あなたという人は……！ \n もう少し 魔王としての自覚を持って\n 行動する:
You...! I told you to act with a little more
awareness as the Demon King.

221430.「それから ゼクレスと バルディスタでの行動も \n 決して ほめられたものでは:
And your behavior in Zechres and Valdista has
not been complimentary at all. Your attitude
is one thing...

221432.「あなたこそ すっかり 寝坊したくせに。\n 魔王が しもべに 責任転嫁ですか…:
You're the one who overslept. The Demon King,
shifting the blame to his own servant...

221434.「昨日は ザードの尖塔まで\n ユシュカを 呼びにいってくれたそうだな。\n 手:
I heard you went to the Zard Spire yesterday
to fetch Yushka. Sorry to have caused you so
much trouble.

221436.「これから 君たちは ゲルヘナ幻野を北上し\n 大審門を目指すことになる。\n:
From here, you will travel northward through
the Gerhena Field to the Demongate. You must
have visited there at least once.

221438.「ユシュカからの要請に応え 他国の魔王たちも \n 大審門前の集落に 集まってく:
In response to Yushka's request, the Demon Kings of the other nations will gather at the settlement in front of the Demongate. Beyond
the gate is Demon Mountain.

221440.「デモンマウンテンでは 大魔王の資格を問う \n さまざまな試練が 待っているそ:
At Demon Mountain, there are various trials waiting to test the qualifications of a Great Demon King. The contents of the trials change
each time the Demongate is opened.

221442.「もちろん 大魔王になろうとする魔族は \n 三国の魔王だけに 限らないし\n:
Of course, the demons seeking to become Great Demon King are not limited to the Demon Kings of the three nations, and the competition
among them will be fierce.

221444.「ふん……。 \n せいぜい 見極めてもらおうじゃないか。\n 大魔王たらんとす:
Hmph... then let's take my measure. We'll see
just how worthy I am of becoming the Great
Demon King.

221446.「ナジーン 留守はまかせた。\n 先に行ってるぞ！:
Nazine, you're in charge of things here. I'm
going on ahead!

221450.「まーた 城の上から 飛び降りたんですかぁ？: Did you jump off the top of the castle again?

221452.「あんな 行儀の悪い 大魔王がいるものか。\n まったく いつまで経っても 自由:
Has there ever been a more ill-mannered Great
Demon King? He'll always be a free spirit...

221454.「……ともあれ ユシュカが\n 無茶なマネをしないよう\n しっかり 見張っても:
Anyway, can you keep an eye on Yushka to make
sure he doesn't do anything crazy?

221456.「君が ついていてくれれば\n 安心して 留守をあずかれるというものだ。\n 主:
With you at his side, I can watch over this
place in peace. Please take care of my lord.

221460.「本当に 待たされたよ……。\n 集まった連中が うるさくて仕方なかった。:
We were really kept waiting... and the crowd
was so loud.

221462.「やはり 貴様が ファラザードの魔王だったか。\n あまりに遅いので もはや\n:
As I thought, you are the Demon King of
Farazard. I thought you would no longer be
coming since you are so late...

221466.「……それじゃ さっそく 始めるとしよう。: Well then, let's get started right away.

221468.<center>相克する 天運を持つ者 集いし時\n大魔王への道は 開かれる。\:
When those with opposing fates gather, the
path to the Great Demon King will open. Now is
the time...

221470.<center>王の試練を 乗り越え\nいざ 頂へと 来たれ！！:
Pass the trials of kings, and come to the
summit!

221478.「この大矛を受け止める 覚悟のある者だけ \n 登ってくるがいい！:
Only those prepared to face my blade may climb
up!

221480.「さて……俺たちも 行くとしよう。\n こんなところで 雑魚に構ってるヒマはない:
Well... we'd better get going. We don't have
time to waste on the small fry here.

221482.「あんれまあ……門が 開いてますじゃ。\n まいど おおきに！:
Well, well, well... the gate is open. Don't
mind if I do!

221488.「どうやら 試練が 待ち受けているようだぞ。: It seems the trials await us.

221492.「まだ 道のりは長そうだ。\n さっさと 先に進むとしよう。:
We still have a long way to go. Let's move on
quickly.

221494.「おいおい……さびしいことを 言いなさんな。\n お互い 知らぬ仲じゃ ないんだ:
Now, now... no need to be so cold. It's not
like we're strangers to each other.

221496.「今日は あの時の礼に\n ちょっとした プレゼントを用意したのさ。\n きっと:
I have a little present for you today, as a
thank you for what you did for me. I think
you'll like it.

221502.「大魔王の資格を問う試練に 手助けなど不要。 \n なぜ 命令を無視して ついて:
I don't need help in this test of my
qualifications to be the Great Demon King. Why
did you disobey my orders and follow?

221504.「いや なんでって…………\n そりゃァ 心配だし………………なァ？:
No, because... well, we're worried about you,
you know?

221506.「私のチカラが 信じられない者は\n そこに並べ……。:
If you don't believe in my power, then line up
there...

221508.「あの岩と同じように たたき斬ってやる！: I'll cut you all down, just like those rocks!

221512.「よう。助かったぜ ヴァレリア。 \n よかったら 一緒に 上を目指さないか？:
Yo. Thanks for the help, Valeria. I was
wondering if you'd like to join me in
reaching the top?

221516.「同行すれば お前の かわいい部下たちに \n カラまれることはないだろうと 思:
I figured if I went with you, I wouldn't have
to be harassed by your precious underlings.

221518.「これで 一緒に行く理由は なくなったな。: Now there's no reason for us to go together.

221522.「いやはや まったく……。\n しかし これで 先へ進めますじゃ。: Oh, my... but at least now I can move on.

221526.「あんなのも 大魔王になろうとしてるのか……。:
Is that guy trying to become the Great Demon
King too?

221534.「なんだって こんなところに？\n おい 起きろ…………:
What the hell are you doing here? Hey, wake
up...

221544.「お前に 復讐するために はるばる\n デモンマウンテンまで 追いかけてきたらし:
It seems he chased you all the way to Demon
Mountain to get revenge on you.

221546.「その復讐心を 母上に……\n エルガドーラに 利用されて\n やっかいな呪いを:
And now my mother... Elgadora has taken
advantage of his grudge and put a nasty curse
on him.

221548.「奴の怒りが消えない限り\n 呪いが 心と身体をむしばみ続け\n 地獄の果てまで:
As long as his wrath remains, the curse will
continue to consume his mind and body, and he
will chase you to ends of hell...

221552.「他人事みたいに言うな！ \n お前のせいで 面倒に巻き込まれたんだぞ\n ユシ:
Don't talk like it's not your problem! It's
your fault I'm in this mess, Yushka!

221560.「おい シシカバブ！ どこを見てる。\n お前の相手は そんな やせっぽちか？:
Hey, Shish Kebab! Where are you looking? Is
your opponent supposed to be that scrawny?

221562.「魔王ユシュカは この俺だ。\n かかってこい！！: I'M Demon King Yushka. Come and get me!

221566.「これで 少しは アタマが冷えただろう。: I hope this has cooled your head a little.

221570.「シシカバブ。 \n 盗賊団の首領なんて やめてしまえ。\n もっと ふさわしい:
Shish Kebab. Stop being the leader of a band
of thieves. I'll give you a place where you
can belong.

221574.「オデをッ！ バカにしやがってエエエエエ！！: You! You keep making a fool of me!!

221576.「なにを言っでも！ どう がんばっでも！\n どうせバカだど 役立たずのクズだど:
No matter what you say! No matter how hard I
try! I've been laughed at as an idiot, a
useless piece of crap, and looked down on...

221578.「だあれにも わがるはずがねえ！\n のけものにされ みじめなゴミ捨て場が\n:
Nobody can understand! The feelings of those
who have been cast out, who are looked down
on, and have nowhere else to go...

221580.「お前みたいな 魔王なんかにッ！\n なんでも手に入れできた 魔王なんがにッ\n:
A Demon King like you! A Demon King who
received everything he wanted... how could you
understand!?

221582.「は…はなせぇ ユシュカッ！\n お前なんがにぃ 情けをかげられだぐねえ！:
L... lemme go, Yushka! I refuse to be pitied
by you!

221586.「シシカバブよ。お前が 持っている\n 底なしの体力と 打たれ強さほど\n ファ:
Shish Kebab. Nothing would be more useful to
Farazard than your bottomless strength and
resilience!

221590.「今日から お前を……\n ファラザード軍の特攻隊長に 任命する。\n 盗賊団の:
From this day forward, I am appointing you to be the commander of Farazard's suicide squadron. Your companions among the thieves
will also be mine.

221592.「その代わり 俺が お前に\n 生きる意味と 居場所を与えてやる。:
In exchange, I will give you a purpose and a
place to stay.

221602.「うぉおおん うぉおおん……ユシュカァ！\n オデは お前を カン違いしてたど！: Uwooh, uwooh... Yushka! I was wrong about you!

221604.「こんな アタマが悪いオデでも\n 役に立つなんで 言ってぐれたのは\n ユシュ:
Yushka is the first person who has ever told
me that I am useful, even though I'm such an
idiot!

221606.「あ……ああ……。\n 俺が 大魔王になって帰るまで\n ファラザードを守ってく:
Y...yeah...protect Farazard until I return as
the Great Demon King.

221608.「ガーーーーッハッハッハッハッハ！！！\n ガッテン承知ど！\n 特攻隊長シシカ:
Gaaaahahahahah!!! Understood! Leave it to your
suicide squad commander, Shish Kebab!

221610.「お前は 変わらないな……アスバル。\n 自分の立場は後回しにして 誰かを助けち:
You never change, Asbal. You put your own position on the back burner to save someone else. It's not like a Demon King at all, but
it's not bad.

221612.「別に……そんなんじゃない。: It's... not like that at all.

221614.「母が シシカバブに呪いをかけたのは\n 明らかに お前たち ファラザード勢を\:
Obviously, my mother's curse on Shish Kebab
was to thwart Farazard.

221616.「僕は 母の助けなんて借りなくても\n お前を倒して 大魔王になれるのに……\n:
I could have defeated you and become the Great
Demon King without my mother's help...but she
got in my way unnecessarily.

221620.「行くわけないだろ。\n 僕たちは 大魔王の座を争う\n 敵同士なんだから……。:
There's no way I'm going. We're enemies vying
for the throne of the Great Demon King...

221622.「ふい～っ。\n 戦いに巻き込まれず すみましたですじゃ。\n まさに 漁夫の利:
Whew～. I was able to avoid getting caught up
in the battle. It's truly a red letter day～.

221626.「あいつ ずっと\n ガケ下に 隠れてたのか……？:
Has he been hiding under the cliff all this
time...?

221636.「ヒィィ～！\n 命ばかりは お助けですじゃーーー！！: Eeek～! I'm only trying to help...!!

221638.「おおっ……これぞ 魔仙卿様のおみちびき！\n ワイは 旅の商人スッテンテン。\:
Oh...this too is the Oracle's guidance! I am
Peddler Suttenten. I've seen you several times
along the way.

221640.「大魔王になるために デモンマウンテンを\n エッコラヤッコラ 登ってきたものの:
I've been climbing up Demon Mountain to become
Great Demon King, but I'm starting to get
tired...

221642.「そこで ここまで生き残った みなさんで\n 野営をしてはどうかと 考えたのです:
So I thought, why don't I set up camp with
those of you who have survived this far?

221644.「ですが～！ この お美しいかたが \n ワイを おそろしいエモノで テンツクツ:
But then...! This beautiful one was going to
use that horrible object on me!

221646.「当たり前だ。このような誘い\n 競争相手をおとしいれる 罠に決まっている。:
Of course. Such enticements are a trap to lure
competitors.

221648.「めめめめ めっそうもない！\n ワイは 何度も みなさんに救われて\n 運よく:
Oh, no no no! I've been fortunate to have been
saved by all of you many times, and I've been
able to climb this far.

221650.「こんな 非力なワイにできる 恩返しといえば\n ウットリするような やすらぎの:
The only way I can return the favor is to
provide a relaxing and soothing experience...

221652.「……よし。では 世話になろう。: Okay... then take good care of us.

221654.「正気で 言ってるのか！？: Are you out of your mind!?

221656.「実際 ここまで来て ヘトヘトだろ。\n この先で 待ち受ける試練を 考えれば\:
You must be exhausted after having come this
far. Considering the trials that lie ahead,
it's best to keep your strength up.

221658.「貴様ら……\n 共謀しているのでは あるまいな？: You... you're not working together, are you?

221660.「気になるなら 見張っていたら どうだ？ \n たき火のそばで 休むだけだぞ。:
If you're so concerned, why don't you keep
watch? We'll just rest by the bonfire.

221662.「その手には 乗らないよ……。\n いつも そうやって 甘い言葉をささやいて\n:
I won't play into your hands... you always try
to get your way with that silver tongue of
yours.

221664.「同感だ。\n ファラザードのやり方は 気に食わん。: Agreed. I don't like Farazard's methods.

221666.「そう 邪険にするな。\n これが 交易で生きてきた 俺のやり方なのさ。:
No need to be so rude. It's simply how I was
raised as a trader.

221668.「いつか ゼクレスや バルディスタとは \n 大々的に交易をしたいと 考えている:
I hope to one day trade with Zechres and
Valdista on a larger scale. It would be
mutually beneficial in the long run.

221670.「……だが 目先の利益だけで 物事は動かない。\n 昔 ゼクレスでは それを思い:
...but things don't work just for short-term
gains. I was reminded of that a long time ago
at Zechres. That was a big mistake...

221672.「アスバルとは うまくやれると 思ってた。\n 互いの益になる 取り引きをしたは:
I thought I could get along with Asbal. I
thought we had a mutually beneficial deal, but
one little misunderstanding and it's all gone.

221674.「ただ……自分でも なんとなく感じてたんだ。\n 俺の中で 何かが欠けてる。\n:
But... I felt it somehow. There was something
missing in me. Something more important than
profit.

221676.「その時 師匠に 大切なことを教わった。\n 俺が 幼い頃から 世話になってる\:
That's when my mentor taught me the most important thing. When I was young, they told me about a certain traveler from Astoltia who
had been a great help to them.

221678.「師匠は 異郷の地アストルティアが\n 発展してきた歴史を 語ってくれた。:
My mentor recounted the history of Astoltia's
development as a foreign land.

221680.「そこでは 種族の異なる者たちが集まり\n それぞれの知識や文化が 混ざり合って:
There, people of different species came
together and mixed their knowledge and
cultures to create one big world.

221682.「考え方が違えば ぶつかることもある。\n そんな時は お互いに知恵を出しあって:
When they had different ways of thinking, they
sometimes clashed. At such times, they shared
their wisdom and found a better solution...

221684.「協調……。\n 師匠の言う それは 協調というものらしい。:
Cooperation... that's what my mentor called
it, apparently.

221686.「魔界にはない概念だが……\n 俺には すぐ わかった。:
It's a concept that doesn't exist in the Demon
World, but I knew right away.

221688.「この魔界に 足りなかったのは \n 他者を受け入れて 交ぜ合わせ\n 新しい価:
What was missing in this Demon World was the
ability to accept others, to mix and mingle,
to create new values.

221690.「たとえ 立場や利害が 違う相手でも\n 協調することで 強く大きくなれる。そこ:
Even if we are in different positions or have different interests, we can become greater and stronger by cooperating. There is no need for
pedigree, authority, fear, or violence.

221692.「どうだ……\n こんな考え方が お前たちにできるか？\n 新しいものを取り入れ:
I wonder... can you even think like this? Can
you accept something new and avert your own
destruction?

221694.「よくも 御託をべらべらと……。\n 協調だと？ 笑わせるな。:
How dare you spout off so much nonsense...
Cooperation? Don't make me laugh.

221696.「アストルティアには まだまだ\n 未知の可能性が 眠ってるに違いない。:
Astoltia must still have a lot of unknown
potential sleeping in the depths.

221698.「そこで 向こうの世界に 行く方法を\n あれこれと 思案していたら……\n な:
So I was trying to figure out how to get to
the other side, and Valdista opened the gate
for me.

221700.「礼が遅れた。感謝してるぞ ヴァレリア。:
I'm late in thanking you. You have my
gratitude, Valeria.

221702.「……かの地に 侵攻した際\n 何者かの手で妨害され\n 我が軍は 撤退を余儀な:
When we invaded that land, we were sabotaged
by someone and our armies were forced to
retreat.

221704.「貴様のしわざか……大いに 納得した。: It was you... I'm very convinced of that.

221706.「やめておいたほうがいい。\n ユシュカは 昔から そういう奴なんだ。\n いち:
You shouldn't do that. Yushka has always been
like that. If you keep on engaging him,
there'll be no end to it.

221708.「……それにしても 君が アストルティアに\n 抜け駆けして行ってたなんて 僕も:
You never told me that you had skipped out on
a trip to Astoltia. It must have been fun.

221710.「いじけるなよ アスバル。\n 俺が大魔王になったら 夢は すぐそこだ。\n 今:
Don't be coy, Asbal. When I become the Great
Demon King, my dream is right around the
corner. Next time, come with us to Astoltia.

221712.「お前なんかには 頼らない……。\n 大魔王になるのは この僕だ！:
I won't depend on you... it's me who will be
the Great Demon King!

221714.「ハッ。とんだ茶番だな。\n 異郷の地は 我らバルディスタが 征服する。:
Ha. What a farce. We Valdistans will conquer
that foreign land.

221716.「先の侵攻で 奴らのチカラが\n どの程度のものかは 理解できた。:
The last invasion gave us an idea of how
powerful they are.

221718.「うわさの勇者姫も 期待していたほどの \n 強さではなかったな……。:
The rumored Hero Princess was not as strong as
I had hoped...

221720.「……そういう油断が 命取りになる。\n アストルティアの 何を理解したというん:
That kind of carelessness can be fatal. What
do you understand about Astoltia? I think
you're the one who's being naive.

221722.「……大魔王になったら こういう奴らを\n ひとつに まとめなきゃならないんだ。:
When I become the Great Demon King, I'll have
to unite all these people into one. It won't
be easy at all.

221724.<pc>は ３人の魔王たちと\nたき火のそばで 休んだ……。<me 64>:
<pc> rested by the bonfire with the
three Demon Kings...<me 64>

221728.「起きたか。\n 俺たちも そろそろ 出発するぞ。: You're up. We'd better get going too.

221730.「他の魔王様は つい先ほど\n 出発してしまいましたですじゃ。:
The other Demon Kings left just a few minutes
ago.

221732.「ワイも 出発しますですじゃ。\n また 後で お会いしましょうですじゃ～！: I'm leaving too. Until we meet again～!

221737.「……やはり ただの \n 無謀な挑戦者では なかったな。:
...I knew he wasn't just some foolish
challenger.

221739.「左様ですじゃ。ひょうきんな\n 旅の商人スッテンテンとは 仮の姿……:
Correct. The funny Peddler Suttenten is just a
temporary form...

221741.「その正体は デモンマウンテンの門番\n デモンズゲイト。:
My true identity is Demon Zugei, the
gatekeeper of Demon Mountain.

221743.「大審門を開いた 相克する天運を持つ者たち。\n この場所に至るまで そのチカラ:
You with conflicting fates who opened the
Demongate. I have been assessing your power
until you arrived at this place...

221745.「そうか。もちろん 合格だろ？: I see. Of course we passed, right?

221747.「これが デモンマウンテン 最後の試練。\n 我こそは 魔仙卿に会う 資格ありと:
This is the final trial of Demon Mountain.
Prove to me that you are worthy of meeting the
Oracle!

221749.「絶対に 負けるわけにはいかない。 \n もし 大魔王に なれなければ\n きっ:
I can't lose. If I don't become the Great
Demon King, I'm sure my mother will try to...

221753.「ま ちょうどいいハンデには なるだろう。\n いくぞ！: It'll be a good handicap for us. Let's go!

221757.「相克する天運を持つ みなさま…… \n どうぞ この先へ お進みくだされですじ:
All you of opposing fates... please continue
onward.

221759.「……ようやく 魔仙卿との対面か。 \n 試されているヒマなど ないのだがな。:
At last, a meeting with the Oracle. I don't
have time for any more tests.

221761.「魔界統一を果たし 乱世を終わらせるため\n 闇の根源のチカラ……\n 必ず 我:
In order to unify the Demon World and end this
turbulent era, the power of the Source of
Darkness... will surely be mine.

221763.「……ユシュカ。僕は 誰の指図も受けず\n 自分のチカラで 自由を手に入れ\n:
Yushka. I will obtain my freedom and fulfill
my desires by my own power, without anyone
telling me what to do.

221769.「……さっきの戦いでは だいぶ 消耗したな。\n だが 休んでる時間はないぞ。:
...I bet that fight just now took a lot of
you. But there's no time to rest.

221771.「いよいよ 魔仙卿とのご対面だ。\n 最後まで ちゃんと ついてこいよ！:
It's finally time to meet the Oracle. Make
sure you stick with me to the end!

245444.「我が大矛の サビになるがいい。: Become a stain upon my halberd.

245971.「常識にとらわれないのは あなたの美徳ですが \n まわりに与える影響も 考えて:
It is your virtue to think outside the box, but I ask you to consider the impact you have on those around you. If you disturb the peace
of the nation, you are on the wrong end of the stick.

245972.「シシカバブ団の件……放置すれば 禍根が残る。:
The Shish Kebab clan...if left unchecked, the
problem will remain.

245973.「これは 彼らだけの問題では ありません。\n 現状に 不満を持つ者どもが 納得:
This is not only their problem. Isn't a ruler
supposed to provide answers that please those
who are dissatisfied with the status quo?

245974.「ったく……お前は いつも 正論ばかりだ。\n そんなことくらい わかってるさ。:
Damn...you're always right. I know that. I'm
not going to leave it at that.

245975.「……よしよし。 \n これなら ナジーンも 文句は言えんだろ。\n あとは あ:
Good, good. I guess Nazine can't
complain now. I'll leave the rest to him.

247733.「彼の 労をねぎらうのを\n どうぞ お忘れなく。:
Please don't forget to thank him for his hard
work.

249350.「現状に 不満を持つ者どもが 納得できる答えを\n 示してこその 統治者なのでは:
Isn't a ruler supposed to provide answers that
please those who are dissatisfied with the
status quo?

249995.<pc>は 階段を上って\n玉座の間へと 進んだ。:
<pc> proceeded up the stairs to the
throne room.

249996.「お帰りなさいませ。\n 我が主 魔王ユシュカ。: Welcome back. My lord, Demon King Yushka.
